name: F Drifter
description:
F Drifter is a fun racing game with an emphasis on drifting. 

Complete the track as fast as possible.

-There are 3 laps.

Currently, there is only one track since this a very early prototype, but if people enjoy it, I will develop this game further. 

That's about it.

(There is also controller support whilst driving if you'd prefer - I do!)
